name: src/index.js
TuneIn
description: TuneIn class, the main class implementing the module

name: constructor

params.name: options
params.description: this is an options object with all the optionals parameters used to initialise the TuneIn client

name: search

params.name: query
params.description: a query string to search for in the TuneIn catalog

name: tune_radio
description: Tune a stream. This will return an object containing details for the specific stream, including URL and format.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the stream to tune, usually resulting from a browsing or a search call

name: describe
description: Describe a stream. This method will retrieve detailed information about a stream.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the stream to fetch information for

name: authenticate
description: Authenticate with supplied username / password, to get access to favorite and customised results

params.name: options
params.description: Options to be passed to the POST call, must contain user's credential

name: browse_show
description: Browse a podcast (Show) for episodes details

params.name: options
params.description: Options object including the show ID

name: browse
description: Browse will browse the TuneIn directory depending on the supplied options paramethers

return.description: results - A JSON object with results from the remote API
